name: Hotrod: Speed Boat Racing Game
description:
Welcome to the world of Top Fuel Hotrod: Drag Boat Racing!

It's the newest, most realistic Speed Drag Boat Racing Game ever made- all available on your iPhone device. Customize every aspect of your builds down to the piston... with a detailed engine simulation to boot!

Build your engine the way you want to! TOP FUEL HOTROD features 100's of different part types resulting in unlimited combinations of ways to make your boat faster!

Drive your boat the way you want to! Weather, wind direction, and chop will affect how straight your hull flies.

Race against opponents across the USA in over 20+ unique locations! Compete for prizes and trophies to claim the title of "World Champion"

TOP FUEL HOTROD will feature over 16 different boat types spanning over 4 different racing classes (River racer, Eliminator, Pro Modified, Top Fuel Hydro)

Engine Customization feature:

- Pick every part in your engine to boost your performance
- Be careful, the more parts in your system, the more likely it is to break
- Test your build using the DYNO, which will give you your power band and HP ratio
- Share your builds with friends! Part of the fun is discovering the best loadouts for your races

Note: If you choose to join as a Gold or Platinum Top Fuel Hotrod member, you are agreeing to an auto-renewing subscription plan that will automatically be charged every month through your account.
